ch0203_00_kate/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s stick to our favorite Pokémon again today so
we can shine brilliantly.
ch0203_00_kate/7101_0701_01_10:
It’s actually surprisingly difficult to stick to your
favorite Pokémon.
ch0203_00_kate/7101_0701_02_10: A person’s ideals don’t always line up with reality.
ch0203_00_kate/7101_0701_03_10:
And when they don’t, you may have to look for
other ways to make your dreams come true.
ch0203_00_kate/7102_0701_01_10:
There’s a place where everyone can shine. That
goes for any and every kind of Pokémon.
ch0203_00_kate/7102_0701_02_10:
And you may reach that place today or
tomorrow...
ch0203_00_kate/7102_0701_03_10:
But there’s no need to rush, because your turn
will come.
ch0203_00_kate/7103_0701_01_10:
What would you do if you were facing a wall
that’s unbelievably high and tough to climb?
ch0203_00_kate/7103_0701_02_10: It’s fine to give up, but I hope you’d try climbing it.
ch0203_00_kate/7103_0701_03_10:
Overcoming a struggle makes you and your
Pokémon shine even brighter.
ch0203_00_kate/7104_0701_01_10:
It’s good to stick to your favorite Pokémon, but
make sure you don’t force your favorite on others!
ch0203_00_kate/7104_0701_02_10:
It’s normal for everyone to be different—people
and Pokémon.
ch0203_00_kate/7105_0701_01_10:
Rather than push their favorite Pokémon
on others...
ch0203_00_kate/7105_0701_02_10:
I believe a good Trainer would make their appeal
in a more subtle way.
ch0203_00_kate/7105_0701_03_10:
I wonder what your approach would be,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0203_00_kate/7105_0701_04_10:
If you showed us even more of your style, maybe
I could see what kind of person you are.
ch0203_00_kate/1701_0701_01_10: A present for you, if you’d like.
ch0203_00_kate/1701_0702_01_10: Use this item beautifully—and make it shine!
ch0203_00_kate/2501_0701_01_10:
When I see you up close as a teammate, your
bright shine is clear.
ch0203_00_kate/2501_0701_02_10:
It hasn’t fully revealed itself yet, so you’ll need to
keep refining it, but...
ch0203_00_kate/2501_0702_01_10:
When you’ve made your dreams come true, please
spread a message for me in your own words:
ch0203_00_kate/2501_0702_02_10: Everyone has a place where they can shine.
ch0203_00_kate/2511_0701_01_10: Say, if you like your Pokémon...
ch0203_00_kate/2511_0701_02_10:
and your Pokémon feel the same about you, isn’t
that a wonderful thing?
ch0203_00_kate/2511_0701_03_10:
If your partner Pokémon feels the same as you, it’s
easy to stick with them.
ch0203_00_kate/2511_0702_01_10:
Even if you face hardship that’s too steep to scale
alone, you can overcome it with your partner
Pokémon, right?
ch0203_00_kate/2511_0702_02_10:
And when you do climb over that wall, I bet your
relationship will become even better.
ch0203_00_kate/3001_0701_01_10:
The sunrise outside is shining bright. Today is
going to be a wonderful day... We’ll make it so!
ch0203_00_kate/3003_0701_01_10:
New encounters happen when you’re proactive.
Maybe I should go out for a walk.
ch0203_00_kate/3005_0701_01_10:
Good effort today. And if you were able to do
what you truly love, give yourself a pat on
the back!
